monashthesisdown 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

monashthesisdown: A package for creating undergraduate, Masters, and PhD theses using R Markdown

monashthesisdown.Rd

Using the bookdown package and LaTeX and Word thesis templates from Reed College, this package aims to encourage reproducible research using simple Markdown syntax while embedding all of the R code to produce plots and analyses as well. This package is adapted for Smith College

thesis_gitbook

Creates an R Markdown thesis template as a webpage

thesis_pdf

Creates an R Markdown thesis template as a PDF

thesis_word

Creates an R Markdown thesis template as a Microsoft Word document

thesis_epub

Creates an R Markdown thesis template as an ebook
